verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> saying<WH559> to them,

Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> These<WH2063> are the beasts<WH2416> which<WH834> you shall eat<WH398> among all<WH3605> the beasts<WH929> that are on<WH5921> the earth.<WH776>
Whatever<WH3605> parts<WH6536> the hoof,<WH6541> and is cloven footed,<WH8156> <WH8157> <WH6541> and chews<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> among the beasts,<WH929> that shall you eat.<WH398>

Nevertheless<WH389> these<WH2088> shall you not eat<WH398> of them that chew<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> or of them that divide<WH6536> the hoof:<WH6541> as the camel,<WH1581> because<WH3588> he chews<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> but divides<WH6536> not the hoof;<WH6541> he is unclean<WH2931> to you.
And the coney,<WH8227> because<WH3588> he chews<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> but divides<WH6536> not the hoof;<WH6541> he is unclean<WH2931> to you.
And the hare,<WH768> because<WH3588> he chews<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> but divides<WH6536> not the hoof;<WH6541> he is unclean<WH2931> to you.
And the swine,<WH2386> though he divide<WH6536> the hoof,<WH6541> and be cloven footed,<WH8156> <WH8157> <WH6541> yet he chews<WH1641> not the cud;<WH1625> he is unclean<WH2931> to you.
Of their flesh<WH1320> shall you not eat,<WH398> and their carcass<WH5038> shall you not touch;<WH5060> they are unclean<WH2931> to you.

These<WH2088> shall you eat<WH398> of all<WH3605> that are in the waters:<WH4325> whatever<WH3605> has fins<WH5579> and scales<WH7193> in the waters,<WH4325> in the seas,<WH3220> and in the rivers,<WH5158> them shall you eat.<WH398>

And all<WH3605> that have not fins<WH5579> and scales<WH7193> in the seas,<WH3220> and in the rivers,<WH5158> of all<WH3605> that move<WH8318> in the waters,<WH4325> and of any<WH3605> living<WH2416> thing<WH5315> which<WH834> is in the waters,<WH4325> they shall be an abomination<WH8263> to you:
They shall be even an abomination<WH8263> to you; you shall not eat<WH398> of their flesh,<WH1320> but you shall have their carcasses<WH5038> in abomination.<WH8262>
Whatever<WH3605> has no<WH369> fins<WH5579> nor scales<WH7193> in the waters,<WH4325> that shall be an abomination<WH8263> to you.

And these<WH428> are they which you shall have in abomination<WH8262> among<WH4480> the fowls;<WH5775> they shall not be eaten,<WH398> they are an abomination:<WH8263> the eagle,<WH5404> and the ossifrage,<WH6538> and the ospray,<WH5822>
And the vulture,<WH1676> and the kite<WH344> after his kind;<WH4327>
Every<WH853> <WH3605> raven<WH6158> after his kind;<WH4327>
And the owl,<WH1323> <WH3284> and the night<WH8464> hawk,<WH8464> and the cuckoo,<WH7828> and the hawk<WH5322> after his kind,<WH4327>
And the little<WH3563> owl,<WH3563> and the cormorant,<WH7994> and the great<WH3244> owl,<WH3244>
And the swan,<WH8580> and the pelican,<WH6893> and the gier<WH7360> eagle,<WH7360>
And the stork,<WH2624> the heron<WH601> after her kind,<WH4327> and the lapwing,<WH1744> and the bat.<WH5847>
All<WH3605> fowls<WH5775> that creep,<WH8318> going<WH1980> on all four,<WH702> shall be an abomination<WH8263> to you.

Yet<WH389> these<WH2088> may you eat<WH398> of every<WH3605> flying<WH5775> creeping<WH8318> thing that goes<WH1980> on all four,<WH702> which<WH834> have legs<WH3767> above<WH4605> their feet,<WH7272> to leap<WH5425> with<WH2004> on the earth;<WH776>

Even these<WH428> of them you may eat;<WH398> the locust<WH697> after his kind,<WH4327> and the bald<WH5556> locust<WH5556> after his kind,<WH4327> and the beetle<WH2728> after his kind,<WH4327> and the grasshopper<WH2284> after his kind.<WH4327>
But all<WH3605> other flying<WH5775> creeping<WH8318> things, which<WH834> have four<WH702> feet,<WH7272> shall be an abomination<WH8263> to you.
And for these<WH428> you shall be unclean:<WH2930> whoever<WH3605> touches<WH5060> the carcass<WH5038> of them shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even.<WH6153>
And whoever<WH3605> bears<WH5375> ought of the carcass<WH5038> of them shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even.<WH6153>

The carcasses of every<WH3605> beast<WH929> which<WH834> divides<WH6536> the hoof,<WH6541> and is not cloven footed,<WH8156> <WH8157> <WH6541> nor<WH369> chews<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> are unclean<WH2931> to you: every<WH3605> one that touches<WH5060> them shall be unclean.<WH2930>

And whatever<WH3605> goes<WH1980> on his paws,<WH3709> among all<WH3605> manner of beasts<WH2416> that go<WH1980> on<WH5921> all four,<WH702> those<WH1992> are unclean<WH2931> to you: whoever<WH3605> touches<WH5060> their carcass<WH5038> shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even.<WH6153>
And he that bears<WH5375> the carcass<WH5038> of them shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even:<WH6153> they are unclean<WH2931> to you.

These<WH2088> also shall be unclean<WH2931> to you among the creeping<WH8318> things that creep<WH8317> on the earth;<WH776> the weasel,<WH2467> and the mouse,<WH5909> and the tortoise<WH6632> after his kind,<WH4327>
And the ferret,<WH604> and the chameleon,<WH3581> and the lizard,<WH3911> and the snail,<WH2546> and the mole.<WH8580>

These<WH2088> are unclean<WH2931> to you among all<WH3605> that creep:<WH8318> whoever<WH3605> does touch<WH5060> them, when they be dead,<WH4194> shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even.<WH6153>

And on whatever<WH3605> any of them, when they are dead,<WH4194> does fall,<WH5307> it shall be unclean;<WH2930> whether it be any<WH3605> vessel<WH3627> of wood,<WH6086> or<WH176> raiment,<WH899> or<WH176> skin,<WH5785> or<WH176> sack,<WH8242> whatever<WH3605> vessel<WH3627> it be, wherein<WH834> any work<WH4399> is done,<WH6213> it must be put<WH935> into water,<WH4325> and it shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even;<WH6153> so it shall be cleansed.<WH2891>
And every<WH3605> earthen<WH2789> vessel,<WH3627> into where<WH834> any of them falls,<WH5307> whatever<WH3605> is in it shall be unclean;<WH2930> and you shall break<WH7665> it.

Of all<WH3605> meat<WH400> which<WH834> may be eaten,<WH398> that on<WH5921> which<WH834> such water<WH4325> comes<WH935> shall be unclean:<WH2930> and all<WH3605> drink<WH4945> that may be drunk<WH8354> in every<WH3605> such vessel<WH3627> shall be unclean.<WH2930>

And every<WH3605> thing whereupon<WH834> <WH5921> any part of their carcass<WH5038> falls<WH5307> shall be unclean;<WH2930> whether it be oven,<WH8574> or ranges<WH3600> for pots, they shall be broken<WH5422> down:<WH5422> for they are unclean <WH2931>and shall be unclean<WH2931> to you.

Nevertheless<WH389> a fountain<WH4599> or pit,<WH953> wherein there is plenty<WH4723> of water,<WH4325> shall be clean:<WH2889> but that which touches<WH5060> their carcass<WH5038> shall be unclean.<WH2930>
And if<WH3588> any part of their carcass<WH5038> fall<WH5307> on any<WH3605> sowing<WH2221> seed<WH2233> which<WH834> is to be sown,<WH2232> it shall be clean.<WH2889>
But if<WH3588> any water<WH4325> be put<WH5414> on the seed,<WH2233> and any part of their carcass<WH5038> fall<WH5307> thereon,<WH5921> it shall be unclean<WH2931> to you.
And if<WH3588> any beast,<WH929> of which<WH834> you may eat,<WH402> die;<WH4191> he that touches<WH5060> the carcass<WH5038> thereof shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even.<WH6153>

And he that eats<WH398> of the carcass<WH5038> of it shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even:<WH6153> he also that bears<WH5375> the carcass<WH5038> of it shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> the even.<WH6153>
And every<WH3605> creeping<WH8318> thing that creeps<WH8317> on the earth<WH776> shall be an abomination;<WH8263> it shall not be eaten.<WH398>

Whatever<WH3605> goes<WH1980> on the belly,<WH1512> and whatever<WH3605> goes<WH1980> on all four,<WH702> or<WH5704> whatever<WH3605> has more<WH7235> feet<WH7272> among all<WH3605> creeping<WH8318> things that creep<WH8317> on the earth,<WH776> them you shall not eat;<WH398> for they are an abomination.<WH8263>

You shall not make yourselves<WH5315> abominable<WH8262> with any<WH3605> creeping<WH8318> thing that creeps,<WH8317> neither<WH3808> shall you make yourselves<WH5315> unclean<WH2930> with them, that you should be defiled<WH2933> thereby.

For I am the LORD<WH3068> your God:<WH430> you shall therefore sanctify<WH6942> yourselves,<WH5315> and you shall be holy;<WH6918> for I am holy:<WH6918> neither<WH3808> shall you defile<WH2930> yourselves<WH5315> with any<WH3605> manner of creeping<WH8318> thing that creeps<WH7430> on the earth.<WH776>
For I am the LORD<WH3068> that brings<WH5927> you up out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> to be your God:<WH430> you shall therefore be holy,<WH6918> for I am holy.<WH6918>

This<WH2063> is the law<WH8451> of the beasts,<WH929> and of the fowl,<WH5775> and of every<WH3605> living<WH2416> creature<WH5315> that moves<WH7430> in the waters,<WH4325> and of every<WH3605> creature<WH5315> that creeps<WH8317> on the earth:<WH776>
To make a difference<WH914> between<WH996> the unclean<WH2931> and the clean,<WH2889> and between<WH996> the beast<WH2416> that may be eaten<WH398> and the beast<WH2416> that may not be eaten.<WH398>
